00021 // PRIVATE VARIABLES
00022 // -----------------
00023 
00024         // ACTIVE CONNECTIONS
00025         // ------------------
00026 pthread_mutex_t  _connections_mutex = PTHREAD_MUTEX_INITIALIZER;
00027 litm_connection *_connections[LITM_CONNECTION_MAX];
00028 
00029         // CONNECTIONS PENDING DELETION
00030         // ----------------------------
00031 pthread_mutex_t  _connections_pending_deletion_mutex = PTHREAD_MUTEX_INITIALIZER;
00032 litm_connection *_connections_pending_deletion[LITM_CONNECTION_MAX];
00033

00038 
00039         litm_code
00040 litm_connection_open(litm_connection **conn) {
00041 
00042         //DEBUG_LOG(LOG_INFO, "litm_connection_open: BEGIN");
00043 
00044         int target_index, code;
00045 
00046         code = pthread_mutex_trylock( &_connections_mutex );
00047         if (EBUSY==code) {
00048                 return LITM_CODE_BUSY;
00049         }
00050 
00051         target_index = __litm_connection_get_free_index(_connections);
00052         if (-1 == target_index) {
00053                 pthread_mutex_unlock( &_connections_mutex );
00054                 return LITM_CODE_ERROR_NO_MORE_CONNECTIONS;
00055         }
00056 
00057         *conn=malloc(sizeof(litm_connection));
00058         if (NULL==*conn) {
00059                 pthread_mutex_unlock( &_connections_mutex );
00060                 return LITM_CODE_ERROR_MALLOC;
00061         }
00062 
00063         queue *q = queue_create();
00064         if (NULL==q) {
00065                 free(*conn);
00066                 pthread_mutex_unlock( &_connections_mutex );
00067                 return LITM_CODE_ERROR_MALLOC;
00068         }
00069 
00070 
00071         _connections[target_index] = *conn;
00072         (*conn)->input_queue = q;
00073 
00074         DEBUG_LOG(LOG_INFO, "litm_connection_open: OPENED, index[%u] ref[%x], q[%x]", target_index, *conn, q);
00075 
00076 
00077         pthread_mutex_unlock( &_connections_mutex );
00078 
00079         //DEBUG_LOG(LOG_INFO, "litm_connection_open: END");
00080         return LITM_CODE_OK;
00081 }//
00082 
00083 
00084 
00085         litm_code
00086 litm_connection_close(litm_connection *conn) {
00087 
00088         if (NULL==conn) {
00089                 return LITM_CODE_ERROR_BAD_CONNECTION;
00090         }
00091 
00092         pthread_mutex_lock( &_connections_pending_deletion_mutex );
00093 
00094                 int target_index = __litm_connection_get_free_index(_connections_pending_deletion);
00095 
00096                 if (-1 == target_index) {
00097                         pthread_mutex_unlock( &_connections_pending_deletion_mutex );
00098                         return LITM_CODE_ERROR_NO_MORE_CONNECTIONS;
00099                 }
00100 
00101                 _connections_pending_deletion[target_index] = conn;
00102 
00103                 DEBUG_LOG(LOG_INFO, "litm_connection_close: PENDING conn[%x]", conn);
00104 
00105         pthread_mutex_unlock( &_connections_pending_deletion_mutex );
00106 
00107         return LITM_CODE_OK;
00108 }//
00109 
00110         litm_connection *
00111 __litm_connection_get_ptr(int connection_index) {
00112 
00113         if ((LITM_CONNECTION_MAX <= connection_index) || 0==connection_index)
00114                 return NULL;
00115 
00116         return _connections[connection_index];
00117 }//
00118 
00119         int
00120 __litm_connection_get_index(litm_connection *(table)[], litm_connection *conn) {
00121 
00122         int index, result = -1; //pessimistic
00123 
00124         for (index=1; index<LITM_CONNECTION_MAX; index++ ) {
00125                 if ( conn == table[index] ) {
00126                         result = index;
00127                         break;
00128                 }
00129         }//for
00130 
00131         return result;
00132 }//
00133

00135 
00136 /**
00137  * Verifies if a `spot` is available in
00138  *  the connection map OR -1 if none.
00139  *
00140  */
00141         int
00142 __litm_connection_get_free_index(litm_connection *(table)[]) {
00143 
00144         int index, result=-1;
00145         for (index=1; index<LITM_CONNECTION_MAX; index++) {
00146                 if (NULL==table[index]) {
00147                         result=index;
00148                         break;
00149                 }
00150         }
00151 
00152         return index;
00153 }//

00156         void
00157 _litm_connections_lock(void) {
00158 
00159         pthread_mutex_lock( &_connections_mutex );
00160 }//
00161 
00162         int
00163 _litm_connections_trylock(void) {
00164 
00165         return pthread_mutex_trylock( &_connections_mutex );
00166 }//
00167 
00168 
00169         void
00170 _litm_connections_unlock(void) {
00171 
00172         pthread_mutex_unlock( &_connections_mutex );
00173 }//

00175 /**
00176  * Returns -1 when BUSY, 1 for OK, 0 for ERROR
00177  */
00178         int
00179 _litm_connection_validate(litm_connection *conn) {
00180 
00181         int code = _litm_connections_trylock();
00182         if (EBUSY==code) {
00183                 return -1;
00184         }
00185 
00186         int i, returnCode = 0;
00187         for (i=1;i<=LITM_CONNECTION_MAX;i++)
00188                 if ( conn== _connections[i] ) {
00189                         returnCode = 1;
00190                         break;
00191                 }
00192 
00193         return returnCode;
00194 }
00195 
00196 /**
00197  * Should only be used when holding
00198  * the lock on the _connections.
00199  */
00200         int
00201 _litm_connection_validate_safe(litm_connection *conn) {
00202 
00203                 int i, returnCode = 0;
00204                 for (i=1;i<=LITM_CONNECTION_MAX;i++)
00205                         if ( conn == _connections[i] ) {
00206                                 returnCode = 1;
00207                                 break;
00208                         }
00209 
00210                 return returnCode;
00211 
00212 }
